name: Grid container
description: Applies container that supports grid layout with multiple columns (if needed)

attribute_definitions.name: CSS helper classes for the wrapper
attribute_definitions.description: Please use any Bootstrap helpers (https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.6/utilities/) for top/bottom paddings, margins for banner etc (i.e. 'mb-2 mb-lg-0')

attribute_definitions.name: CSS helper classes for the content
attribute_definitions.description: Please use any Bootstrap helpers (https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.6/utilities/) for top/bottom paddings, margins for banner etc (i.e. 'mb-2 mb-lg-0')

attribute_definitions.name: Container width
attribute_definitions.description: Please specify Container max-width (by default - u-site-width)

attribute_definitions.name: Inner content width
attribute_definitions.description: Please specify content columns width (by default - 12 columns or full container width)

attribute_definitions.name: Columns width config (by default: all equal width)
attribute_definitions.description: Specify string in format X Y ... N where each number is column width (0..12). Use spacebar as delimiter. Note - all column width in total should not exceed 12. Sample: '4 6' (2 columns, first one is narrower). If no config is applied - column width will be equal for all columns
